ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernard Baily,George Roussos,Nick Cardy,Sheldon Moldoff,Bernard Baily,Sheldon Moldoff,George Roussos,Nick Cardy,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pen That Never Lied!: A magic quill pen only produces the truth, no matter what its user writes.
Beware, I Can Read Your Mind: As a child strange radiation gives Johnny Carter the ability to read minds, but a lifetime of hearing other people's thoughts is driving him mad.
The Forbidden Wish: Cal Colby finds a Native American talisman that grants him whatever he wishes for, but warns him not to wish for immortality.
The Face in the Clock: Bart Crane can't escape the face appearing in timepieces that keeps announcing the time of his death because it belongs to Father Time.
ComicInfo.Title: The Pen That Never Lied!; Beware, I Can Read Your Mind; The Forbidden Wish; The Face in the Clock
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
